revised_title: Experimental Researches in Magnetism and Electricity: Paradoxical Effects and Magneto-Electricity
tldr: The author conducted experiments with magnets and coils to study magnetism and electricity. They discovered that an indefinitely small amount of magnetism or dynamic electricity can induce or evolve an indefinitely large amount of magnetism, which contradicts previous beliefs. This led to the understanding of magneto-electricity and the principle of conservation of energy.
